system.description: Effect: The user reduces their HP to 0 and Faints. After the user Faints, the Target recovers all of its HP and PP, and is cured of all Status Conditions. If the user is an owned Pokemon and their Trainer has another Pokemon that is not Fainted in a Poke Ball, that Pokemon may be designated the target of this Attack.

actions.name: Lunar Dance
actions.description: Effect: The user reduces their HP to 0 and Faints. After the user Faints, the Target recovers all of its HP and PP, and is cured of all Status Conditions. If the user is an owned Pokemon and their Trainer has another Pokemon that is not Fainted in a Poke Ball, that Pokemon may be designated the target of this Attack.
